projects.description: This project uses vanilla javascript to show the usage eventlisteners to show you a random quote I have generated for you to read. The background behind these quotes are to motivate you to continue pushing because your dreams are aligned for you to grab!
This project is displays students listed in our directory that we have created and displaying for users to browse through the pages to find a student and some useful information!

This project displays employees from a start up and provides more information on a click of the person. This was achieved by using a open source API, and using JSON to better grab the important information that we want the users to see!
This is  a form for a developer convention to enter their names and a shirt they would want and courses they want to attend! Along with a responsive source of payment they want to use!

This project presents blank phrases where you have to guess a letter, if you select the right letter your letter will appear. But if you guess the wrong letter you lose a life and you have up to five lives until the game is over!
